main event: Multiple sightings of a glowing white object recorded from Offutt AFB, Nebraska on May 15, 1959.
interesting points: The object changed course multiple times during the observation,The observers included military personnel with considerable experience in aircraft reconnaissance,The sighting included calls from multiple eyewitnesses, including flight crew of a commercial airline,The object was described as glowing white and then turned to a glowing green color before disappearing,Three Des Moines tower operators reported similar sightings around the same time.
